pca_and_ml.PCA.select_percentage¶

PCA.select_percentage(percentage: int = 20, calc_histograms: bool = True)¶

Select percentage percent of traces from the left-most and right-most of the PCA histogram Parameters ———- percentage : the amount of traces to select from each side, stored in group1 and group2, respectively

calc_histograms : bool, default: True

Returns:

MCBJ STM-BJ
